entry.title: TrayCD - 1.2
entry.content:
Released 1.2.
This release fixes a couple of minor bugs. The new version is also available in 64-bit. The installer will automatically install the correct executable. New language: Farsi by Samad Alaamati. For more details, see the changelog below.

Changelog:
  • Added 64-bit executable. The installer will automatically install the correct executable.
  • Added manual update check to the tray menu.
  • Fixed the Shell_NotifyIcon error that appeared for some when TrayCD was on autostart.
Visit the website

entry.title: SuperF4 - Bulgarian translation
entry.content:
Released Bulgarian translation of SuperF4.
This translation is right now only available as a separate archive in the download section. The translation will be included in the installer in the next version. Thanks to Malin Markov for submitting the translation!

entry.title: SuperF4 - 1.2
entry.content:
Released 1.2.
This update mainly brings support to StarCraft II and a few bug fixes. Another new thing is a native 64-bit executable (the installer will automatically install the correct executable). For more details, see the changelog below.

Changelog:
  • Added 64-bit executable. The installer will automatically install the correct executable.
  • Added support for alternative Ctrl+Alt+F4 detection (see SuperF4.ini). Enable this to make SuperF4 work in StarCraft II.
  • Added xkill to the tray menu (Win+F4).
  • Added manual update check to the tray menu.
  • Fixed the Shell_NotifyIcon error that appeared for some when SuperF4 was on autostart.
Visit the website
Download installer - Archive: English (x64) - Spanish (x64) - Galician (x64)

entry.title: TrayCD - lock.exe
entry.content:
Uploaded a small console program, lock.exe, that can lock/unlock cd-rom drives. A locked cd-rom drive can't be ejected. Why would you need this? I do not know.

Visit the website
Download lock.exe
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)

entry.title: AltDrag - 0.8
entry.content:
Released 0.8.
The new things since the beta are 64-bit support for HookWindows, the ability to configure what keys trigger the alt dragging, the ability to reconfigure what the mouse buttons do. I have fixed a few bugs, most notable: the alt key will no longer trigger the window menu! New language: Russian by Gluek. If you are updating from 0.7, there are a few more things as well, which were described in the last update.

Changelog:
  • Added AutoStick, enable it to make windows always stick without needing to press shift. This replaces StickyScreen.
  • Renamed ExperimentalFeatures to HookWindows, also improved it so resizing is now supported and windows should no longer flicker. 64-bit programs also work now. I no longer consider it experimental!
  • The alt key will no longer activate the window menu!
  • Added the ability to configure what keys should trigger the dragging, resizing, etc.
  • Added the ability to configure what the mouse buttons do. New actions: minimize and center.
  • Improved multi-monitor support a lot.
  • Tweaked the blacklist (see wiki).
Visit the website
Download installer - Archive: English - Spanish - Galician - Korean - Russian
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)

entry.title: AltDrag - 0.8 beta 2
entry.content:
Released 0.8 beta 2.
I am releasing this as a beta but it is still the most recommended version available. I have made some major changes and fixes, not to mention a few new features. First of all, I have completely redone the feature previously called ExperimentalFeatures. I renamed it to HookWindows since I no longer consider it experimental and I encourage you to try it out. A few other new things are AutoStick, an improved version of StickyScreen, and RMBMinimize which makes your right mouse button minimize windows. I have also done a lot of fixes to multi-monitor support. New language: Galician by Alexander De Sousa. Users of 0.7 and 0.8b1 won't be automatically notified of this version. I plan to support 64-bit windows with HookWindows for the stable 0.8.

Changelog:
  • Added AutoStick, enable it to make windows always stick without needing to press shift. This replaces StickyScreen.
  • Renamed ExperimentalFeatures to HookWindows, also improved it so resizing is now supported and windows should no longer flicker. I no longer consider it experimental.
  • Added RMBMinimize, enable it to minimize windows with the right mouse button.
  • Improved multi-monitor support a lot.
  • Tweaked the blacklist (see wiki).
Visit the website
Download installer - Archive: English - Spanish - Galician - Korean
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)

entry.title: ShutdownGuard - 0.4
entry.content:
Released 0.4.
I finally got around to work some on ShutdownGuard. The biggest new feature is the ability to patch programs to prevent them from forcing the computer from shutting down. This is experimental (and disabled by default), read more on the wiki.
Another nice thing is that I have added a Reboot button to the shutdown dialog.
New language: Galician by Alexander De Sousa.

Changelog:
  • Added the ability to patch apps (see wiki).
  • Added reboot button to the shutdown dialog.
  • Added Silent option.
  • Added HelpUrl option.
  • Language can now be changed in ShutdownGuard.ini.
Visit the website
Download installer - Archive: English - Spanish - Galician - Lithuanian - Nynorsk
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)

entry.title: KillKeys - 1.1
entry.content:
Released 1.1.
This release fixes a crash that prevented the use of both Keys and Keys_Fullscreen at the same time. It also fixes many small bugs. No major feature added. New language: Galician by Alexander De Sousa.

Changelog:
  • Fixed crash when using both Keys and Keys_Fullscreen.
  • Language can now be changed in KillKeys.ini.
  • A lot of small bug fixes.
